verses.text: \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \add was\add* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. And his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Jedidah|strong="H3040"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Adaiah|strong="H5718"\w* of \w Boscath|strong="H1218"\w*.

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* in all the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and turned not \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* to the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* or to the \w left|strong="H8040"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass in the \w eighteenth|strong="H8083"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w*, \add that\add* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azaliah|strong="H0683"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*, the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, that he may \w sum|strong="H8552"\w* the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* which is \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which the \w keepers|strong="H8104"\w* of the \w door|strong="H5592"\w* have \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:\f + \fr 22.4 \ft door: Heb. threshold\f*

And let them \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* it into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w doers|strong="H6213"\w* of the \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, that have the \w oversight|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and let them \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it to the \w doers|strong="H6213"\w* of the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* which \add is\add* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to \w repair|strong="H2388"\w* the \w breaches|strong="H0919"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*,

Unto \w carpenters|strong="H2796"\w*, and \w builders|strong="H1129"\w*, and \w masons|strong="H1443"\w*, and to \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* and \w hewn|strong="H4274"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* to \w repair|strong="H2388"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

Howbeit there was no reckoning \w made|strong="H2803"\w* with them of the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* that was \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, because they \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* \w faithfully|strong="H0530"\w*.

¶ And \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, I have \w found|strong="H4672"\w* the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. And \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* to \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, and he \w read|strong="H7121"\w* it.

And \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* have \w gathered|strong="H5413"\w* the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* that was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and have \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* it into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of them that \w do|strong="H6213"\w* the \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, that have the \w oversight|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 22.9 \ft gathered: Heb. melted\f*

And \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* \w shewed|strong="H5046"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* me a \w book|strong="H5612"\w*. And \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w* it \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

And it came to pass, when the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* had \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, that he \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, and \w Achbor|strong="H5907"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Michaiah|strong="H4320"\w*, and \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, and \w Asahiah|strong="H6222"\w* a \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,\f + \fr 22.12 \ft Achbor: or, Abdon\f*\f + \fr 22.12 \ft Michaiah: or, Micah\f*

\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* ye, \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* for me, and for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and for all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, concerning the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w book|strong="H5612"\w* that is \w found|strong="H4672"\w*: for \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \add is\add* the \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* that is \w kindled|strong="H3341"\w* against us, because our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have not \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w book|strong="H5612"\w*, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according unto all that which is \w written|strong="H3789"\w* concerning us.

So \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w*, and \w Achbor|strong="H5907"\w*, and \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, and \w Asahiah|strong="H6222"\w*, \w went|strong="H3212"\w* unto \w Huldah|strong="H2468"\w* the \w prophetess|strong="H5031"\w*, the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Shallum|strong="H7967"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Tikvah|strong="H8616"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Harhas|strong="H2745"\w*, \w keeper|strong="H8104"\w* of the \w wardrobe|strong="H0899"\w*; (now she \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* in the \w college|strong="H4932"\w*;) and they \w communed|strong="H1696"\w* with her.\f + \fr 22.14 \ft wardrobe: Heb. garments\f*\f + \fr 22.14 \ft in the…: or, in the second part\f*

¶ And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Tell|strong="H0559"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* you to me,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Behold, I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and upon the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof, \add even\add* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* which the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* hath \w read|strong="H7121"\w*:

Because they have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* me, and have burned \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* unto \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, that they might provoke me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* with all the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*; therefore my \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* shall be \w kindled|strong="H3341"\w* against this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and shall not be \w quenched|strong="H3518"\w*.

But to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* which \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* you to \w enquire|strong="H1875"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, thus shall ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add As touching\add* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which thou hast \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*;

Because thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* was \w tender|strong="H7401"\w*, and thou hast \w humbled|strong="H3665"\w* thyself \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, when thou \w heardest|strong="H8085"\w* what I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* against this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and against the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof, that they should become a \w desolation|strong="H8047"\w* and a \w curse|strong="H7045"\w*, and hast \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* thy \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me; I also have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add thee\add*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Behold therefore, I will \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* thee unto thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and thou shalt be \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* into thy \w grave|strong="H6913"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*; and thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* shall not \w see|strong="H7200"\w* all the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* which I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* upon this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*. And they \w brought|strong="H7725"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.
